landing.heroSubtitle: From planning to payroll — SchichtPlan simplifies your entire shift management in one platform.
landing.step1Desc: Plan shifts with drag & drop, use templates and let the system suggest available time slots automatically. Conflicts are detected instantly.
landing.step2Title: Distribute to everyone with one click
landing.step2Desc: Publish the finished schedule and notify your entire team automatically. Real-time confirmations.
landing.step3Title: Stay on top of daily operations
landing.step3Desc: Manage shift swaps, absences and check-ins in one place. Everything in real time.
landing.step4Desc: Export hour reports, detect overtime and comply with labor laws — all automatically.
landing.benefitsSubtitle: Everything you need for professional shift scheduling — in one platform.
landing.benefit1Desc: Recurring shifts and smart automations put an end to spreadsheet chaos.
landing.benefit2Desc: Employees see their shifts instantly and can swap with ease.
landing.benefit3Desc: Automatic checks for rest periods and labor law compliance.
landing.benefit4Desc: Labor cost forecasts and overtime tracking in real time.
landing.benefit5Desc: Vacation, sick leave and holidays managed in one system.
landing.benefit6Desc: Shift scheduling that teams love — simple and intuitive.
landing.faq1A: Yes! SchichtPlan is currently completely free to use. We are working on additional premium features for larger teams.
landing.faq2Q: How quickly can I get started?
landing.faq2A: In under 5 minutes. Sign up, add your employees and create your first shift schedule.
landing.faq3A: Absolutely. All data is hosted GDPR-compliant in Germany and transmitted encrypted.
landing.faq4A: Yes, employees can submit swap requests directly. As a manager, you retain full control and approve changes.
landing.faq5Q: Is there an app for employees?
landing.faq5A: SchichtPlan works fully in the browser on any device. A native app is in the works.
landing.ctaTitle: Ready to revolutionize your shift scheduling?
landing.ctaSubtitle: Start for free and discover how easy workforce planning can be.

notificationPrefs.title: Email Notifications
notificationPrefs.subtitle: When enabled, you will receive an email for shift assignments and other important updates.
notificationPrefs.emailDesc: Receive emails for shift assignments, absence requests, and other updates.
notificationPrefs.emailInfo: When email notifications are enabled, you will be emailed about new shift assignments, approved absences, and other important events. In-app notifications are not affected.

automations.title: Automations
automations.description: Configure automatic rules for your workspace
automations.subtitle: Control which automations are active. All rules are based on German labor law (ArbZG) and your business rules.

categories.shiftManagementDesc: Automatic checks and rules for shift planning
categories.timeTrackingDesc: Automatic time entries, breaks, and account calculation
categories.approvalsDesc: Automatic approval of absences and shift swaps

shiftConflictDetection.name: Shift conflict detection
shiftConflictDetection.desc: Automatically detects overlapping shifts, absence conflicts, and availability restrictions when planning shifts.

restPeriodEnforcement.name: Rest period enforcement (ArbZG §5)
restPeriodEnforcement.desc: Ensures at least 11 hours of rest between shifts, as required by German labor law.

cascadeAbsenceCancellation.name: Auto-cancel shifts on absence
cascadeAbsenceCancellation.desc: Automatically cancels all affected shifts when an absence is approved and notifies managers about coverage needs.

autoCreateTimeEntries.name: Auto-create time entries
autoCreateTimeEntries.desc: Automatically creates time entries from past shifts that have not been tracked yet. Runs daily at 02:00.

legalBreakEnforcement.name: Legal break enforcement (ArbZG)
legalBreakEnforcement.desc: Automatically enforces minimum legal breaks: 30 minutes for 6+ hours, 45 minutes for 9+ hours of work.

timeAccountRecalculation.name: Time account recalculation
timeAccountRecalculation.desc: Automatically recalculates time account balances after each confirmed time entry.

recurringShifts.name: Recurring shifts
recurringShifts.desc: Allows creating recurring shifts over multiple weeks with automatic conflict checking.

autoApproveAbsence.name: Auto-approve absences
autoApproveAbsence.desc: Automatically approves sick leave immediately. Other absences are auto-approved if no shift conflicts exist.

autoApproveSwap.name: Auto-approve shift swaps
autoApproveSwap.desc: Automatically approves shift swap requests when neither employee has conflicts from the swap.

overtimeAlerts.name: Overtime alerts
overtimeAlerts.desc: Automatically notifies managers when employees exceed their contracted weekly hours.

payrollAutoLock.name: Payroll auto-lock
payrollAutoLock.desc: Automatically locks all reviewed time entries 5 days after month end to prevent retroactive changes.

notifications.name: System notifications
notifications.desc: Sends automatic notifications to employees and managers on shift assignments, approvals, and status changes.
